error.location_not_supported: Your location is not supported for Gemini API. Please use VPN or switch to local AI services (Ollama + ComfyUI).
error.location_not_supported_vpn:
Location not supported error (may occur even with VPN):

Possible causes:
1. API Key registered in unsupported region
2. VPN not routing all traffic correctly
3. Browser/app still using local IP

Solutions:
â€¢ Regenerate API Key in supported region (e.g., USA)
â€¢ Ensure VPN routes all traffic (system-level VPN)
â€¢ Switch to local AI services (Ollama + ComfyUI)
â€¢ Check browser console for full error details

error.quota_exceeded: API quota exceeded. Please try again later or check your API quota.
error.generation_failed: Generation failed. Please check the console for details.
error.api_key_configure: Please configure API Key in settings first or switch provider.
error.confirm_error_message: Click OK to return to home, or Cancel to view console details.
